Message:
Today, I’m teaching the son
of a distinguished family
how to be a ruler.

Tomorrow, it’s bridal lessons
for a daughter of nobles.
Afterwards, it’s military science
for an aspiring knight.

Many households are in need
of my services as a home tutor.

Now that the Curse
is running rampant,

more households rely on
home tutors than schools.

I’ve lived my days traveling
from house to house,
and town to town.

Everywhere in this country
is submerged underwater,
so traveling is fraught
with hardships.

But, as long as there are
students who need me,

nothing will stop me
from going to them.
That’s the only reason I need.
